metadata.name: Seasonal Patterns Dataset
metadata.description: Seasonal energy patterns and their influence on BaZi analysis for timing and decision-making
metadata.author: FatePath BaZi Master

fields.name: baZiGuidance
fields.description: BaZi analysis guidance for this season
fields.example: Focus on Wood element activities and growth

data.energy: Growth, expansion, new beginnings, and upward movement. Spring represents the awakening of life and the start of new cycles.
data.baZiGuidance: Focus on Wood element activities and growth. This is an excellent time for new projects, learning, and personal development. Wood element people will feel particularly strong during this season.

data.energy: Peak energy, passion, activity, and outward expression. Summer represents the height of yang energy and maximum activity.
data.baZiGuidance: Focus on Fire element activities and high-energy pursuits. This is the best time for leadership, sales, and activities requiring charisma and energy. Fire element people will excel during this season.

data.energy: Stability, harvest, and grounding. Late summer represents the transition from peak activity to stability and preparation for winter.
data.baZiGuidance: Focus on Earth element activities and stability. This is an excellent time for building foundations, administrative work, and nurturing existing projects. Earth element people will feel most comfortable during this season.

data.energy: Harvest, completion, and inward focus. Autumn represents the gathering of resources and preparation for the quiet of winter.
data.baZiGuidance: Focus on Metal element activities and completion. This is the best time for finishing projects, analysis, and precision work. Metal element people will feel particularly strong during this season.

data.energy: Rest, reflection, and inward energy. Winter represents the quietest time of year, perfect for contemplation and strategic planning.
data.baZiGuidance: Focus on Water element activities and reflection. This is an excellent time for strategic planning, creative work, and long-term thinking. Water element people will feel most comfortable during this season.

seasonalTransitions.springToSummer: Transition from growth to peak activity. Focus on maintaining momentum while building energy.
seasonalTransitions.summerToLateSummer: Transition from peak activity to stability. Focus on grounding and building foundations.
seasonalTransitions.lateSummerToAutumn: Transition from stability to harvest. Focus on completion and preparation.
seasonalTransitions.autumnToWinter: Transition from harvest to rest. Focus on reflection and planning.
seasonalTransitions.winterToSpring: Transition from rest to new beginnings. Focus on awakening and growth.

elementSeasonalGuidance.wood: Strongest in spring, focus on growth and new beginnings during this season
elementSeasonalGuidance.fire: Strongest in summer, focus on leadership and high-energy activities during this season
elementSeasonalGuidance.earth: Strongest in late summer, focus on stability and foundation building during this season
elementSeasonalGuidance.metal: Strongest in autumn, focus on completion and precision work during this season
elementSeasonalGuidance.water: Strongest in winter, focus on reflection and strategic planning during this season

timingAdvice.newProjects: Start in spring for natural growth energy
timingAdvice.leadership: Take action in summer for maximum impact
timingAdvice.completion: Finish projects in autumn for natural closure
timingAdvice.planning: Strategic planning in winter for deep insights
